intro: Neolourya thailandica, commonly known as Thai starflower, is a flowering plant native to Thailand. It belongs to the family Apiaceae, which includes carrots and parsley. The plant is characterized by its small, star-shaped white or yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are finely divided and aromatic, often used in traditional medicine. Neolourya thailandica thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories.
